page.title: 19Trade in South Bradford.
page.content: {Shopping}facilities in the West Bowling area of South Bradford are rather limited.In the immediate vicinity is the{Co-op food hall,} several small{food shops,}some of ethnic origin,a number of{butchers,}a {post office}and some clothing can be purchased but mainly for small children.There are several{Asian cloth houses.There are a number of{take away {shops,}Chinese,Indian and fish and chips.There are two{launderettes}and several small{cafes.}The shops tend to be in small groups.In the outer limits of the 'block' there are several {supermarkets}but choice is restricted and large items-furniture,clothing, electrical,must be purchased in the city centre stores.On the Euroway Trading Estate,situated off the M606, is a large{DIY centre,a car auction} and places open to the trade only.
